Header: KLN Commander Pays Last Respect to ‘Mother of Church’
Content: Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi (SF-KLN) paid his last respects to late Mrs Luiza Arunaamma Thambirasa, the pioneering founder of the Navajeewanam Methodist Church - Murasamodai and a well-known social worker who is famed as ‘Mother of Church’ on Wednesday (22). The deceased, who was the mother of former TNA Councillor, Mr Thambirasa Kurukularasa was a popular social service worker in the area. Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, SF-KLN together with General Officer Commanding, 57 Division, Brigadier A.S Hewawitharana, Commanders of 572, 573 Brigades and Commanding Officer, 1 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) visited the house of mourning and extended their condolences over a demise.
